description: Add sticky full-height app shell sidebar layout modifier
context:
Beads description:
Add a modifier for app shell layouts where the sidebar is sticky and full viewport height, while the main content scrolls independently.

**Use case:**
Dashboard/app layouts where the sidebar navigation stays fixed while users scroll through content.

**Potential API:**
- .layout-sidebar.sticky - sidebar sticks to viewport
- .layout-sidebar.app-shell - full app shell behavior

**Considerations:**
- Should work with .sidebar-nav component
- Need to handle mobile/responsive behavior
- May relate to graffiti-8tj (viewport layout issues)
